names: All Primes (1 mod 4) Equal the Sum of Two Squares
remarks: All primes of the form ` 4 k + 1 ` are sums of two squares.  This is Metamath 100 proof #20.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Jun-2015.)
statement:
2sq $p |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ ( P mod 4 ) = 1 ) -> E. x e. ZZ E. y e. ZZ P = ( ( x ^ 2 ) + ( y ^ 2 ) ) ) $.
$d P x y $.
